text: Bruce Harry Dinwiddy, CMG (1 February 1946 - 1 April 2021) was a British politician. Dinwiddy was the Governor of the Cayman Islands from May 2002 to October 2005. Dinwiddy was born in Epsom. He worked for the Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) from 1973 to 2005. Dinwiddy died on 1 April 2021, aged 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British civil servants Category:People from Surrey Category:Governors of the Cayman Islands
title: Bruce Dinwiddy
